mapper.select: SELECT SUM( IF(t.PARENT_ID IS NULL, t.ACCOUNT, (SELECT s.ACCOUNT FROM rocky_b_subscribe s WHERE s.TENDER_ID = t.ID))) FROM ROCKY_B_TENDERRECORD t, rocky_borrow b WHERE t.USER_ID = #{memberId} and b.ID = t.BORROW_ID and b.STATUS >= 4
SELECT SUM(R.MONEY) FROM rocky_rechargerecord R WHERE R.STATUS = '1' AND R.USER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT SUM(C.TOTAL) FROM rocky_cashrecord C WHERE C.STATUS = '2' AND C.USER_ID = #{memberId}
